name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Jerry LOGAN, Appellant (two cases)

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
ROBERTS, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Jerry LOGAN, Appellant (two cases).

opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Linda J. Bryant, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Edward G. Rendell, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Deputy Dist. Atty. for Law, Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., William Boland, Asst. Dist. Atty., Stephen Seeling, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
393 A.2d 363
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Jerry LOGAN, Appellant (two cases).
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 21, 1978.
Decided Oct. 5, 1978.
Reargument Denied Nov. 9, 1978.
Linda J. Bryant, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Edward G. Rendell, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Deputy Dist. Atty. for Law, Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., William Boland, Asst. Dist. Atty., Stephen Seeling, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
